name: Thoo Mell
description:
You are  n o w h e r e  and some robots are here to do  n o t h i n g. The robots are so lazy that they use  B l o o t h o o t  (not bluetooth)

Move with arrow keys WASD or with a the left analog stick of a controller

  • Red robots moves normally
  • Blue robots go VROOOM
  • Yellow robots decide to go the opposite way
  • Green robots go unused and moves like Blue and Yelllow
